original_text: We have come a very long way. This bread was warm when we put it in our bags on the day that we left home. But see how hard and dry it has become.
korean_text: 우리의 이 떡은 우리가 당신들에게로 오려고 떠나던 날에 우리들의 집에서 아직도 뜨거운 것을 양식으로 가지고 왔으나 보소서 이제 말랐고 곰팡이가 났으며

sentences.original_text: We have come a very long way.
when we put it in our bags
on the day that we left home.
But see how hard and dry it has become.
